document.full_text: the ohio house of representatives approved two bills on wednesday that would give ohioans more rights to carry concealed weapons, including one that allows people to carry a gun into a bar.
document.title: ohio house passes bills allowing more concealed guns
lines_and_colors: the ohio house of representatives approved two bills on wednesday that would give ohioans more rights to carry concealed weapons, including one that allows people to carry a gun into a bar.
